pizza.name: Garden Fresh Veggie Pizza
pizza.Desc: An abundance of delicious veggies with less crust - a perfect Garden Fresh Pizza! Jalapenos, Corn, Black Olives, Crunchy Bell Peppers, Tomatoes, Onion & Mozzarella Cheese on an herbed and soft crust.

pizza.name: Exotica Paneer Pizza
pizza.Desc: More chunky paneer, less bread - a perfect match made in the cheese heaven! Tender Paneer Tikka, Corn, Onion & Mozzarella Cheese, topped up till the end of a soft crust.

pizza.name: Double Cheese Margherita Pizza
pizza.Desc: Cheese the day with our double cheese Margherita pizza, with as much cheese as there can be! Brimming with Mozzarella Cheese and a hint of parsley, on a herby and soft crust.

pizza.name: Smoked Chicken Sausage Pizza
pizza.Desc: If you havent tried this smoky deliciousness, you havent stumbled upon your new favourite yet! Smoked Chicken Sausages, Crunchy Capsicum, Onion and Mozzarella Cheese on a soft crust.

pizza.name: Kheema and Sausage Pizza
pizza.Desc: More chunky paneer, less bread - a perfect match made in the cheese heaven! Tender Paneer Tikka, Corn, Onion & Mozzarella Cheese, topped up till the end of a soft crust.

pizza.name: Corn Veggie Delight Pizza
pizza.Desc: MAn exuberance of Golden Corn, Onions, Tomatoes and plenty of crunchy Green Bell Peppers with no bready crust to leave behind.

pizza.name: Spanish Sunshine Pizza
pizza.Desc: Enjoy a colorful abundance of veggies in this tasteful combination. Tell us gracias later! American Corn, Jalapenos, Crunchy Capsicum,Tomatoes, Onion & Mozzarella Cheese on a soft crust.

pizza.name: Supreme Cheese Burst Pizza
pizza.Desc: Oozing with a cheesy abundance! Feel the delicate Mediterranean flavours come alive in every bite with Falafels, Roasted Crunchy Veggies and Mozzarella Cheese on a soft crust.

pizza.name: Butter Chicken Cheese Burst Pizza
pizza.Desc: MAn exuberance of Golden Corn, Onions, Tomatoes and plenty of crunchy Green Bell Peppers with no bready crust to leave behind.

pizza.name: Cheese Burst Pizza
pizza.Desc: Gooey deliciousness for your cheese-tooth! Relish our awesome five-some Tender Paneer Tikka, Jalapenos, Black Olives, American Corn & Onion with Mozzarella Cheese on a soft crust
